definitions.meaning: permission, leave; уэ уи 1изынк1э: with your permission, by your permission
relig belief, faith; ~ уи1экъым: 1. you are an atheist; 2. fig you have no conscience
1.  depravity, perversity; 2. adj that is spoiled/spoilt in vain; ~ хэлъхьэн (къыхуэгъэк1уэн): 1. to pervert, to make depraved; 2. to spoil (smth.)
(greeting ) welcome!, welcome back!, happy home return!

~ verbal prefix 1. designates drawing near, approaching smb., smth.; ex.: к1элындорым  1ухьэн: to approach   the corridor; 2. designates stay/sojourn near smb., smth.; ex.: мывэр бжэм 1улъщ: the stone lies near the door; 3. designates quick visual movement towards an object; блэк1ым 1уплъэн: to cast a glance at the passer-by.

mind; intellect; reason; sense; акъылыр мащ1э хъун: to lose possession of one’s faculties; ~ жан: keen/sharp mind/intellect; * ~ къэхьыжын: to come to one’s senses, to become/grow reasonable; акъылым къимыщтэ (къимыт1эс): it passes all understanding, it’s inconceivable; ~ хэлъу: reasonably, sensibly; акъылым итыжын: to be in one’s right mind; акъылым ихун: to drive (smb.) mad; ~ къэщтэжын: to come to (see) reason, to come to one’s senses; акъылым къихьэжын: 1) to recover/regain consciousness; 2) fig. to come to (see) reason, to come to one’s senses; ~ пхэнж: crooked mind; акъылыр хунэсын (къищтэн, хуэк1уэн): to grasp, comprehend, understand, perceive (smth.); to think (of smth.), to devise, invent (smth.); to venture, undertake (smth.); акъылым ик1ын: to go mad, to go off one’s head; to lose one’s head; акъылыр щхьэщихун: to drive (smb.) mad; акъылыр зэк1уэк1ын: to go out of one’s mind; акъылыр зэгъэк1уэк1ын: to drive (smb.) mad; to turn (smb.’s) head; ~ дыкъуакъуэ: declining mind/intellect; ~ бгъэдэлъын: to be clever/intelligent, to be sensible; зы ~ нэхърэ акъылит1: (prov.) two heads are better than one; four eyes see more than two.

anat 1. heart; гур мауэ: the heart is beating; 2.  heart; cardiac; гууз: heart disease; * гухьэлэл: kind heart; губыдэ: heart of stone; гурэ псэк1э: from (the bottom of ) one's heart; игук1э арэзыуэ: from the bottom of one's heart; whole-heartedly; гум къыщ1итхъыу: reluctantly,   grudingly; игу ежэл1эн: to take/lay to heart; гум жьы дихужащ: (I, he, etc.) felt relieved; гурщ1эузу: with a sad heart; гум къихын: to make (smth.) up; гум игъэхужын: to blot out of one's memory; гум ихужын: to be blotted out of one's memory; гум ихун: 1. to be blotted out of one's memory; 2. to forget; гум къинэн: to be stamped/engraved on one's memory; гум ирихьын: to please (smb.); гум иубыдэн: to memorize, to take good note (of smth.); ~ хэгъэлъын: to remember, to keep in mind; to bear/have in mind; гум темыхуэн: to endure, bear, suffer; гум темыхуэн:1. not to endure/bear/suffer; 2. to hate, detest, abhor (smb., smth.); гур ихын: to scare (smb.) stiff
